title: Ep. 184 - When Are We Going To #ExposePublicSchools?
description:
A New York Times reporter went fishing for negative stories about Christian schools. But if we are going to #ExposeChristianSchools, what about public schools? Should they be "exposed" as well? Also, a women sexually assaulted a man at the Women's March. And I'll answer a few very interesting emails. Date: 01-25-2019
